about_the_game:
[h2] Game Description[/h2]

In the magic runes, you'll play as different characters as you fight your way through the rooms. You can create a unique character by matching different skills and equipment, and choose unique and exclusive skills. Abundant skills and equipment, unique blessings and treasures will bring you an exciting and thrilling gaming experience.

[h2] Character Introduction[/h2]

Each character in the magic rune stone has its own unique attack pattern, and you can experience a different operation experience for each character.

[img][/img]

[h2] Exclusive Skills[/h2]

Each character has a unique skill slot, and different characters have different exclusive skills. Each character also has their own dedicated skill upgrade page. Players can unlock exclusive skills of different genres through different blessings.

[img][/img]

[h2] General Skills[/h2]

Each character has 4 general skill slots, and common skills can be equipped with different skills through skill stones during the game. Each universal skill can be leveled up with a blessing. Upgrading skills can significantly increase their power and performance, and some skills can also change their mechanics.

[img][/img]

[h2] equip[/h2]

Each character can carry up to 9 pieces of equipment at once. Equipment has 4 different rarities, the higher the rarity, the higher the stat bonus, and some will have some special effects. In addition to providing attribute bonuses, equipment also provides blessings, and players can choose different types of equipment according to their own needs.

[img][/img]

[h2] blessing[/h2]

Blessings are provided by equipment or in-game Blessing Statues. Blessings unlock some special effects when certain conditions are met. Blessings are divided into attribute classes, career classes, element classes and support classes, and the general skills need blessings to upgrade them according to the type of skills, and different blessings are needed in the character's exclusive skills to unlock the follow-up exclusive skills of different genres. Players are free to choose and match blessings according to their needs.

[img][/img]

[h2] Jewel[/h2]

Treasures are in-game artifacts that are used to increase the player's output or survival. Players can try different routines and genres through the effects of Treasure and equipment and blessings.
